Tsoton."},{"lineNumber":49693,"originalJapaneseLine":"　暗号化しますが、千鶴子様なら解読できます」","translatedEnglishLine":" It will be encrypted, but Chizuko-sama will be able to decode it.\""},{"lineNumber":49694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いかん。いかんいかんいかん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, no no no role."},{"lineNumber":49696,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もっと別の、使い捨てられる奴を……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Find someone else disposable for this...\""},{"lineNumber":49697,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、私がやります。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I'll do it."},{"lineNumber":49698,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こういった事なら、たぶん一番適任です」","translatedEnglishLine":" I'm probably the most qualified for something like this.\""},{"lineNumber":49699,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう……他にいないのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... is there no one else?\""},{"lineNumber":49700,"originalJapaneseLine":"「千鶴子様は、さっきも言った、居場所のデータを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As I mentioned earlier, Chizuko-sama has to receive the location data,"},{"lineNumber":49701,"originalJapaneseLine":"　受け取って頂かなくてはなりませんし……","translatedEnglishLine":" so she must take that on..."},{"lineNumber":49702,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マジック様には、無理をして欲しくないですから」","translatedEnglishLine":" And I don't want Magic-sama to overexert herself.\""},{"lineNumber":49703,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺にはウルザちゃんもたいして変わらないように","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To me, Urza-chan and the others don't seem all that different,"},{"lineNumber":49704,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見えるがな」","translatedEnglishLine":" really.\""},{"lineNumber":49705,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふと、ウルザの口元に、少しだけ笑みが浮かんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, a faint smile appeared at Urza's mother.\""},{"lineNumber":49708,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":49709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くす。少しは、支えてあげてくださいね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe. Please support her a little, won't you?\""},{"lineNumber":49710,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、うるさいぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, you're annoying."},{"lineNumber":49711,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういう話はまた今度だ」","translatedEnglishLine":" We'll talk about that some other time.\""},{"lineNumber":49712,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、総統閣下。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, Supreme Commander."},{"lineNumber":49713,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃあ、ツォトンは……お願いします。","translatedEnglishLine":" Then, as for Tsoton... please take care of it."},{"lineNumber":49714,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……あ。一応、私も助けてくれると嬉しいですね」","translatedEnglishLine":" ...Ah. I’d also be glad if you help me, just in case.\""},{"lineNumber":49715,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph.\""},{"lineNumber":49716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………？……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...?...\""},{"lineNumber":49717,"originalJapaneseLine":"やや乱暴な手つきで、","translatedEnglishLine":"With a somewhat rough gesture,"},{"lineNumber":49718,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはウルザの手首を掴んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":" Lance grabbed Urza's wrist."},{"lineNumber":49719,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一応じゃない。絶対に助ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's not just 'just in case.' I'll absolutely help you."},{"lineNumber":49720,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だから、無茶するんじゃないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":" So don't do anything reckless.\""},{"lineNumber":49721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はい。待ってますね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes. I'll be waiting.\""},{"lineNumber":49722,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザの自由な方の手が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Urza's free hand,"},{"lineNumber":49723,"originalJapaneseLine":"そっとランスの手に添えられた。","translatedEnglishLine":" gently laid atop Lance's hand."},{"lineNumber":49724,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははは！　というわけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha! So then,"},{"lineNumber":49725,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しばしの別れの前に――――！」","translatedEnglishLine":" before our brief parting――!"},{"lineNumber":49726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言うと思いました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought you’d say that.\""},{"lineNumber":49727,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはウルザを引き寄せようと力を込めたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance strained to pull Urza closer,"},{"lineNumber":49728,"originalJapaneseLine":"それより早くウルザは手をするりとほどいた。","translatedEnglishLine":" but Urza slipped her hand away faster than he could."},{"lineNumber":49729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...!\""},{"lineNumber":49730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「助けてくれるなら、特別な別れは要りませんよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you're going to help me, there's no need for a special farewell, right?"},{"lineNumber":49731,"originalJapaneseLine":"　心置きなく、行って来ます」","translatedEnglishLine":" I'll go without worry.\""},{"lineNumber":49732,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそ……ええい、くそー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn... ugh, damn it!"},{"lineNumber":49733,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手強いぞ、ウルザちゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":" You're tough, Urza-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":49734,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、知りませんでした？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, didn't you know?\""},{"lineNumber":49735,"originalJapaneseLine":"少しだけ悪戯っぽく、ウルザは微笑んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":" Urza smiled a little mischievously."},{"lineNumber":49736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私、ランスさんより少しだけ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm a little older than you, Lance-san,"},{"lineNumber":49737,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お姉さんなんですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":" you know.\""},{"lineNumber":49738,"originalJapaneseLine":"――――翌日。","translatedEnglishLine":"――――The next day."},{"lineNumber":49739,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ウルザが？　独りで行ったの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Urza? She went alone!?\""},{"lineNumber":49740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「危険な事を…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Such a dangerous thing...\""},{"lineNumber":49741,"originalJapaneseLine":"千鶴子がまなじりを上げ、マジックは頭を抱えたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuko raised her brows furiously, and Magic held her head,"},{"lineNumber":49742,"originalJapaneseLine":"既にウルザは発った後であり、","translatedEnglishLine":" but Urza had already left,"},{"lineNumber":49743,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうする事もできなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":" so there was nothing they could do."},{"lineNumber":49744,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いいの、ランス？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Is it alright, Lance?\""},{"lineNumber":49745,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ウルザちゃんが決めたんだから仕方ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Urza-chan made her decision, so it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":49746,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……まあ、大丈夫だ」","translatedEnglishLine":" ...Well, it'll be okay.\""},{"lineNumber":49747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see...\""},{"lineNumber":49748,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無理するわね、ウルザも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Urza is pushing herself too hard..."},{"lineNumber":49749,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハニー軍団の事もあるのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":" despite the trouble with the Hanny Corps...\""},{"lineNumber":49750,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんとかするって言ってたんだから、大丈夫だろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She said she'd manage somehow, so it'll be fine.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法通信機を持ち込んで、
ツォトンの居場所を送信します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and send the location of Tsoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗号化しますが、千鶴子様なら解読できます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will be encrypted, but Chizuko-sama will be able to decode it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いかん。いかんいかんいかん。
そんな危険な役、ウルザちゃんにやらせられるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't have Urza-chan take on such a dangerous role.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと別の、使い捨てられる奴を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find someone else disposable for this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、私がやります。
こういった事なら、たぶん一番適任です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm probably the most qualified for something like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むう……他にいないのか」
「千鶴子様は、さっきも言った、居場所のデータを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As I mentioned earlier, Chizuko-sama has to receive the location data,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 受け取って頂かなくてはなりませんし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she must take that on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック様には、無理をして欲しくないですから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And I don't want Magic-sama to overexert herself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺にはウルザちゃんもたいして変わらないように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To me, Urza-chan and the others don't seem all that different,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見えるがな」
ふと、ウルザの口元に、少しだけ笑みが浮かんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a faint smile appeared at Urza's lips.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、王族となると重責は格別ですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After all, being royalty carries particularly heavy responsibilities.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに……お母さんになったばかりですし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides... you just became a mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くす。少しは、支えてあげてくださいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe. Please support her a little, won't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、うるさいぞ。
そういう話はまた今度だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll talk about that some other time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、総統閣下。
じゃあ、ツォトンは……お願いします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, as for Tsoton... please take care of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……あ。一応、私も助けてくれると嬉しいですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Ah. I’d also be glad if you help me, just in case."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん」
やや乱暴な手つきで、
ランスはウルザの手首を掴んだ。
「一応じゃない。絶対に助ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not just 'just in case.' I'll absolutely help you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、無茶するんじゃないぞ」
「……はい。待ってますね」
ウルザの自由な方の手が、
そっとランスの手に添えられた。
「がははははは！　というわけで、
しばしの別れの前に――――！」
「言うと思いました」
ランスはウルザを引き寄せようと力を込めたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance strained to pull Urza closer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより早くウルザは手をするりとほどいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Urza slipped her hand away faster than he could.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「助けてくれるなら、特別な別れは要りませんよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you're going to help me, there's no need for a special farewell, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心置きなく、行って来ます」
「くそ……ええい、くそー！
手強いぞ、ウルザちゃん！」
「あら、知りませんでした？」
少しだけ悪戯っぽく、ウルザは微笑んだ。
「私、ランスさんより少しだけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm a little older than you, Lance-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お姉さんなんですよ」
「ウルザが？　独りで行ったの！？」
「危険な事を…………」
千鶴子がまなじりを上げ、マジックは頭を抱えたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuko raised her brows furiously, and Magic held her head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既にウルザは発った後であり、
どうする事もできなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so there was nothing they could do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いいの、ランス？」
「ウルザちゃんが決めたんだから仕方ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Urza-chan made her decision, so it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……まあ、大丈夫だ」
「無理するわね、ウルザも……
ハニー軍団の事もあるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: despite the trouble with the Hanny Corps..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとかするって言ってたんだから、大丈夫だろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She said she'd manage somehow, so it'll be fine."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

そっとランスの手に添えられた。
「がははははは！　というわけで、
しばしの別れの前に――――！」
「言うと思いました」
ランスはウルザを引き寄せようと力を込めたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance strained to pull Urza closer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより早くウルザは手をするりとほどいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Urza slipped her hand away faster than he could.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「助けてくれるなら、特別な別れは要りませんよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you're going to help me, there's no need for a special farewell, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心置きなく、行って来ます」
「くそ……ええい、くそー！
手強いぞ、ウルザちゃん！」
「あら、知りませんでした？」
少しだけ悪戯っぽく、ウルザは微笑んだ。
「私、ランスさんより少しだけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm a little older than you, Lance-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お姉さんなんですよ」
「ウルザが？　独りで行ったの！？」
「危険な事を…………」
千鶴子がまなじりを上げ、マジックは頭を抱えたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuko raised her brows furiously, and Magic held her head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既にウルザは発った後であり、
どうする事もできなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so there was nothing they could do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いいの、ランス？」
「ウルザちゃんが決めたんだから仕方ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Urza-chan made her decision, so it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……まあ、大丈夫だ」
「無理するわね、ウルザも……
ハニー軍団の事もあるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: despite the trouble with the Hanny Corps..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとかするって言ってたんだから、大丈夫だろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She said she'd manage somehow, so it'll be fine."
